mainComment: islam fasik tak pnh baca quran sekalipun mukadam..itu yg x jumpa surah al kafirun.

content_justifications.justification_text: The comment contains explicit religious slurs by calling Islam 'fasik' which means immoral or impious
It targets and insults Muslims who allegedly do not read the Quran

malay_justification.justification_text: Komen mengandungi kata-kata hinaan agama secara jelas dengan memanggil Islam 'fasik' yang bermaksud tidak bermoral atau durhaka
Mensasarkan dan menghina umat Islam yang didakwa tidak membaca al-Quran

AKTA Hasutan.Violation Analysis: Explicitly insulting a religious group which can incite religious hatred.

PENAL CODE.Violation Analysis: Deliberate insult with intention to provoke religious outrage.

CMA 1998.Violation Analysis: Improper use of network facilities to transmit offensive content targeting religion.

TikTok Guidelines.Violation Analysis: Violates TikTok policies against religious hate speech.
